440980.name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Last Stand
440980.description:
In this FREE DLC for Vermintide, we give you a brand new game mode called Last Stand as well as its first map, Town Meeting.

It’s time to test your mettle in Last Stand, a brand new gamemode with a single objective: staying alive. With no hope of rescue, the heroes are making a last desperate stand, fighting increasingly difficult hordes of Skaven. How long will it take before they finally fall?

Last Stand

Last Stand is an extremely difficult mode which will put your skills and equipment to the test. You and your team are tasked with staying alive as long as possible, fighting against increasing odds. The longer you survive, the greater your glory and rewards will be, in the form of experience, tokens and Inn decorations!
440980.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
